original_text: Nobody can buy wisdom. You may have lots of gold and silver, but you can never buy wisdom. Nobody can buy wisdom.
korean_text: 순금으로도 바꿀 수 없고 은을 달아도 그 값을 당하지 못하리니

sentences.original_text: You may have lots of gold and silver,
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 금과 은을 가질 수는 있지만,

sentences.original_text: but you can never buy wisdom.
